news.headline: Nvidia supplier SK Hynix logs bumper Q1, sees limited tariff impact on AI chips
news.summary: SEOUL (Reuters) -SK Hynix, a key supplier of high-bandwidth memory processors to Nvidia, said quarterly profit more than doubled and demand for AI chips was so robust that it expects only limited impact on those products from potential U.S. tariffs. news.headline: Why WeRide Stock Plummeted Today
news.summary: WeRide (NASDAQ: WRD) stock got crushed Wednesday despite a bullish day of trading for the broader market.
